SummaryEnglish: A story about three sisters struggling to survive in a desolate world surrounded by decaying buildings and red fog. The story revolves around Rin, a girl with an updo. There's also Ritsu, the big sister who has cat ears and is always calm, and Rina, the innocent, cheerful one dressed in a maid's costume. Just what is it that these sisters are after in this mysterious world?

1.SummaryEnglish: First collected episode of the original animation Kemurikusa, originally released as 13 shorts, one to four minutes in length, from 2010 to 2012 by the independent production group 'Irodori', to which Director Tatsuki belongs. Adapted into a full TV anime in 2019.

2.SummaryEnglish: Second collected episode of the original animation Kemurikusa, originally released as 13 shorts, one to four minutes in length, from 2010 to 2012 by the independent production group 'Irodori', to which Director Tatsuki belongs. Adapted into a full TV anime in 2019.

3.SummaryEnglish: Third collected episode of the original animation Kemurikusa, originally released as 13 shorts, one to four minutes in length, from 2010 to 2012 by the independent production group 'Irodori', to which Director Tatsuki belongs. Adapted into a full TV anime in 2019.

10.SummaryEnglish: On April 3, 2019, Tatsuki posted a mini episode called "Episode 12.1" on his Twitter as a follow-up to the conclusion of the anime. It depicts the older sisters Ryoku, Ryo and Riku.

11.SummaryEnglish: A collaboration between Kemurikusa's TV series and Nissin. They promote the latter's Donbei Tsukimi Soba (moon-viewing soba) product after Wakaba finds several packages of them.

1.SummaryEnglish: A world covered in a red fog. Inside a decaying building, Rin, a girl with an updo, and Rina, a girl with pigtails, search for water. Just when they were about to report to Ritsu located far away, crisis strikes.

2.SummaryEnglish: Thanks to Wakaba's quick thinking, Rin, Ritsu, and the Rinas are saved. Wakaba's identity is still unknown, but Rin has him tag along for a little expedition.

3.SummaryEnglish: The party is on the move in search of water. The new scenery and objects pique the interest of the ever-curious Wakaba, forcing the Rinas to explain everything. During their journey, they witness something...

4.SummaryEnglish: Wakaba shows a tremendous interest in Kemurikusa. He learns that there are many different kinds in this world, such as the Kemurikusa he received from Ritsu. The group now heads to Sky Bridge.

5.SummaryEnglish: The party continues their search for water. They are forced to walk on foot at one point and decide to give water to Midori. But then...

6.SummaryEnglish: The sisters sleep in the train car in order to rest up. Wakaba goes out alone in search of Kemurikusa, but finds himself lost after getting too caught up in his expedition. Deep inside the building, he sees something unexpected.

7.SummaryEnglish: The party has finally landed on an uncharted island. The end of the tunnel seems to be a different world from what they are used to. With high hopes, they start to follow the root.

8.SummaryEnglish: The party decides to move forward. The red fog is thicker than ever, and Rin, Ritsu, and Rina fight against the attacks of Red Bugs. They soon face a grim reality.

9.SummaryEnglish: Rin, Ritsu, Rina, and Wakaba have come to a new island. The path to their destination proves to be a difficult one, and they decide to come up with a plan for their next course of action.

10.SummaryEnglish: Rin, Ritsu, Rina, and Wakaba each exploit their unique qualities to fight the Red Bugs, and finally...

11.SummaryEnglish: Rin and Wakaba see the leaf's memory on their way to the red tree. They see the First Person and...

12.SummaryEnglish: The party uses all their power to go up against the root. How will the journey end for Rin, Ritsu, Rina, and Wakaba?
